org.jgentleframework.context
Interface ServiceProvider

All Superinterfaces:
Context, IAbstractBeanFactory, IAbstractServiceManagement, Provider
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceProviderImpl, WebProvider
public interface ServiceProvider
extends Provider, IAbstractServiceManagement

Represents a ServiceProvider, an extension of core Provider. This container supports all features which are supported by Provider besides some features such as AOP, Interceptors, ... and all services, framework integrations such as (JMX, JMS, Hibernate, ...).

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Provider, IAbstractServiceManagement

Method Detail

getCSContext

<T> T getCSContext(java.lang.Class<T> clazzType)
Returns an registered ComponentServiceContextType instance.

Parameters:
clazzType - the registered class type of ComponentServiceContextType need to be queried.
Returns:
return an ComponentServiceContextType instance if it existed, if not, throws the run-time exception.

addCSContext

                                           ComponentServiceContextType<T> csc)
Adds a ComponentServiceContextType

Parameters:
clazzType - the class tpye of ComponentServiceContextType need to be added.
csc - the ComponentServiceContextType instance need to be add.

removeComponentServiceContext

<T> T removeComponentServiceContext(java.lang.Class<T> clazzType)
Removes the specified ComponentServiceContextType bound to the given class type.

Parameters:
clazzType - the given class type
Returns:
returns the removed ComponentServiceContextType instance.
